00013 #include "Cassandra.hh"
00014 using namespace libpg;

00016 class BeliefStateCassandra : public Cassandra {
00017 
00018         private:
00019                 Vector* stateTransRow;
00020                 Vector* observationRow;
00021                 Vector* btp1;
00022         protected:
00023                 Vector* belief;
00024 
00025         public:
00026         
00027                 BeliefStateCassandra (Cassandra& c) : 
00028                         Cassandra (c.actionTransitions, c.actionObservations,  c.rewards,
00029                         c.numActions, c.numStates, c.numObservations, c.discount)
00030                         
00031                         {
00032                         
00033                         //init belief state -- curr state.
00034                         belief = new Vector (numStates);
00035                         belief->clear ();
00036                         
00037                         stateTransRow = new Vector (numStates);
00038                         observationRow = new Vector (numObservations);
00039                         btp1 = new Vector (numStates);
00040                         //Or should this be uniform?
00041                         (*belief) (currState) = 1.0;    
00042                         
00043                 }
00044                 
00045         
00046                 
00047                 virtual int doAction (int action);
00048                         
00049                 virtual Vector getBelief () {
00050                         return *(belief);
00051                 }
00052                 
00053                 virtual void getObservation (Observation& obs) {
00054                         for(int i = 0; i < (int)numStates; i++) obs.getFeatures() (i,0) = (*belief) (i);
00055                         obs.getFeatures() (numStates,0) = 1;
00056                         //cout << "returning belief state: " << obs.getFeatures() << endl;
00057                 }
00058                 
00059                 virtual int getObsRows () {
00060                         return numStates + 1;
00061                 }
00062 };
